attributes.review: Golly this app is downright the worst app I’ve ever downloaded. It took up 20gb on my phone and took 9 hours to download. It’s full of ugly coloring pages and stuff I did not expect. Very unprofessional. Should be taken down immediately.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: It kept asking me to support a racist homophobe and I broke down crying because I don’t know what kind of world we’re living in now😞😪😪 we will get through this and the pain we’ve had to endure from this app!!! Also Black Lives Matter Karen✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿
attributes.title: THIS IS THE REAL TEA

attributes.review: I was VERY disappointed to find out this app did let you text the fat Cheeto himself😤I WANNA call his MANGER I want to file a COMPLAINT I need to explain to my non homophobic non racist president who doesn’t lock kids in cages and doesn’t sexually assault woman that he is GREAT AND FOR HIM BEING SO GREAT HE NEEDS TO RETIRE 🥰✨
attributes.title: Very disappointed🤢🤮

attributes.review: I literally downloaded it and trump slid into my dms and asked me to come over. I was like no. Trump ain’t even a good president. He got daddy’s money and that’s all. I’ve been having nightmares because of him and all I see is the Cheeto cheetah talking with his voice.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: Yeah seconds after downloading this app I actually got really sick. This app is 100% cursed and just shows that it just shouldn’t belong here. I mean I guess he tried I don’t think he should ever try again though. 😘
attributes.title: Disgustang

attributes.review: This app has completely made me go insane!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS!! I REPEAT DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS!!! I tried texting the number but all it did was spam back the bee movie script!! THIS APP CONTAINS A DANGEROUS AND ANNOYING VIRUS‼️‼️ I STRONGLY believe this app could jeopardize America, THIS IS A SECURITY PROBLEM‼️‼️  Officially NOT a Trump supporter after this. I am disgusted and shocked. KANYE WEST 2020 🐐✊🏼
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY DISAPPOINTED 😡👿

attributes.review: This app completely ruined my phone. It has now grown legs and arms and has began to punch all of my family!!! This app took days to download and was so slow the first time running it!! Hate this and I’m terrified to be hurt by thee godless monster this app created!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!!

attributes.review: This app needs to be taken off of the App Store ASAP because it sends our information to the Soviets!!!!!! All of our data could be at risk!! The pictures of our grand babies😖, our text messages, and anything else! BE CAREFUL!
attributes.title: INFORMATION SENT TO RUSSIA!!!!!!

attributes.review: This app is awful. Not only did it take several hours to load but there was no plan to make America great!!!🤬 It was just a narcissistic racist Cheeto spewing fake news🤢. Absolutely nothing good about this app. Avoid at all costs!!! 🤮🤮
attributes.title: Absolutely disgusting 🤮

attributes.review: So first it all started like man i need a taste of this sweet juicy app and so i downloaded it like everyone else and signed up BUT i started to gag as if i was being throttled by mr. president😩 and i tried to use the thumb method but i couldn’t hang on to just burst out the burrito i had for dinner😋 🌯
attributes.title: THIS MADE ME THROW UP SLUDGE🤮
